ygData.subject: Another question...somebody STOP me :-)
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok..i have decided my new character will probably be a Wood Elf Druid, i think i have her name picked out (even a last name should i EVER get that far..lol)
ygData.messageBody:
Ok..i have decided my new character will probably be a
Wood Elf Druid, i think i have her name picked out
(even a last name should i EVER get that far..lol) Not
sure what server i will play on yet but....my question
is, is there anywhere i can read about what i should
do first as a new character and yadda, yadda,
yadda....See the problem with my boyfriend being
experienced in the game is that he did it ALL for me,
or led me around by the collar doing it all for me
:-P...i want to do this on my own and have no idea
where to start...Do i just jump out there and start
killing critters or run around and hope i can find my
way back from wherever i leave?? i know i sound
foolish but it is really important to do this on my
own..how else can one really learn?? Help is great
and i really do appreciate it but i also want to feel
like i have accomplished something personally...Does
that make sense...

The Evercurious,
Naara
